ack.p: We thank Dr. Allison Didychuk for technical assistance with size-exclusion chromatography and helpful discussion. We thank Dr. Michael Diamond (Washington University in St. Louis) for the pmab vector and for amplicons containing the WT DENV and WNV NS1 gene. We thank Kendall E. Lee for technical assistance and Dr. Robert Beatty for valuable discussions. Confocal imaging experiments were conducted on a Zeiss LSM 710 at the CRL Molecular Imaging Center, supported by the Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation. We would like to thank Holly Aaron and Feather Ives for their microscopy training and assistance.
